# Projects

#### **Relationship Between Heteromorphic Sex Chromosomes and Organism Longevity**

This project takes species from across the tree of life and considers predictors affecting 
their lifespans. It aims to specifically understand the relationship between heteromorphic 
sex chromosomes, degree of reduction, and longevity.
